bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: A cluster of poems
bibl.orgName: Papers of Walt Whitman (MSS 3829), Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature, Albert H. Small Special Collections Library, University of Virginia

revisionDesc.change: converted from P4 to P5, checked

body.p:
A cluster of poems, (in the same way as "Calamus Leaves") expressing the idea and sentiment of
Happiness,
Extatic life, (or moods,)
Serene Calm
Infantum
Juvenatum
Maturity—a young mans moods. ☞
Middle-age
Strong, well-fibred, bearded, athletic, full of love, full of pride & joy
Old Age
natural Happinesses
Love, Friendship
